------- Original message -------

Date: 8/10/19 10:54 AM (GMT-05:00)

Subject: Epstein

>>> [redacted] 08/10/2019 10:54 >>>
Hi [redacted],
I'm a legal reporter with the Wall Street Journal. Like everyone else, we're trying to find out more about what happened to Jeffrey Epstein overnight. Happy to talk on background or off the record. My phone number is 484-354-[redacted].

Best,
[redacted]
